comments.raw_text:
See for instance http://tinderbox.mozilla.org/showlog.cgi?log=Firefox/1301231312.1301232723.21106.gz ...

REFTEST TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | file:///C:/talos-slave/test/build/reftest/tests/layout/reftests/font-face/underline-offset-change-2.html | image comparison (==)

Will attach the test and ref images.  I smell a font-loading problem rather than an underline-drawing problem; there's nothing at all inside the blue box in the test image.
